amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit any International Military Education and Training Funds from being provided to Indonesia.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 10 in the Congressional Record of June 4, 1996 to prohibit International Military Education funds for Indonesia.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Frank (MA) amendment (A026) Failed by recorded vote: 149 - 272 (Roll no. 227).
